definition: coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

sentences.english: After all, sitting and waiting is how we made money from the subprime debacle.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，我們如何從次貸崩潰賺錢就是坐着等待。

sentences.english: If you want your blog to make money, treat it like a business.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想用你的博客來賺錢，就像經商一樣對待它吧。

sentences.english: However, Taobao also have a common vision off Amoy, Taobao is indeed a lot of money.
sentences.chinese: 但是淘寶也要有淘客共同的目光，淘寶的確很賺錢。

sentences.english: We work. We strive to earn a living.
sentences.chinese: 我們工作，我們努力賺錢養家餬口。

sentences.english: He uses some dubious shifts to get money.
sentences.chinese: 他用一些可疑的手段去賺錢。

sentences.english: We shouldn't boggle at this opportunity to make a profit.
sentences.chinese: 對這個賺錢的機會我們不應猶豫。

sentences.english: In China, respect for your elders, for your forbears , is even more important than making money.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，尊敬老人和列祖列宗要比賺錢更爲重要。

sentences.english: Dr Metcalfe did not make money from the actual invention of Ethernet.
sentences.chinese: 梅特卡夫博士並沒有從以太網的實質發明中賺錢。

sentences.english: PART of making money in this topsy-turvy world is to see the opportunities others don't.
sentences.chinese: 在這個混亂的世界賺錢，就要看到別人沒發現的機會。

sentences.english: Webcomics (comics only on the web, making money through printing books and other things) are pretty popular in the U. S. Do you think that could be popular in China?
sentences.chinese: 中國網上漫畫一樣很火，也有從網上火到出書賺錢的。

sentences.english: Dear, you are responsible to support the family and I am responsible for my beauty.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的，你負責賺錢養家，我負責貌美如花。

sentences.english: It has been rather costly to install the machinery, but it should pay off in the long run.
sentences.chinese: 安裝這套機械代價很高，但從長遠來看它會賺錢的。

sentences.english: As it happens it's been a very profitable non-event.
sentences.chinese: 沒想到這件事情成了件很賺錢的小事兒。

sentences.english: If you want to make money, you must buy cheap and sell dear.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要賺錢，就必須賤買貴賣。

sentences.english: How to use what you already know to make money in the market.
sentences.chinese: 如何用你已經知道的信息，在股市中賺錢。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
to engage in (business etc)/to run/to operate
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
